title: [Large-Scale] Intensive Short-Term Course on Creative Form Composition Using Design Software

context.prior_knowledge: Basic computer literacy and comprehension of design elements
context.additional_context: Training for corporate managers/leaders on using design software to create social sector communication materials

learning_goals: Learners can visualize 3D spatial structures using vector-based geometric composition tools.
Learners can produce complex visual materials tailored to workplace contexts by applying advanced features of design software.
Learners can propose optimized design solutions through geometric abstraction of creative ideas.

resources: Access Permissions for LMS (Learning Management System) Platforms

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
